mention.text: volodia teitelboim , member of the political commission
the most urgent condition for the path into the future
the creation of a broad unity of all opposition forces which can win a victory over pinochet
the communist party , which has had the largest number of casualties and missing and tortured people since the dictatorship was established
el siglo , the communist party newspaper
the gdr , where they can live and work
hundreds of patriots from his country
